rows.label: qev010201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, this sucks. Why the hell is everyone so damn
stingy around this joint, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's not like they can't spare a Skell part or two!
...Or 10. ...Or 20.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0003
rows.name: Hey, YOU agree with me, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010201_SEL0011
rows.name: Admit that Skell parts are way too expensive.

rows.label: qev010201_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev010201_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask why the AMs should give
out free Skell parts to civilians.

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0004
rows.name: Thank goodness SOMEONE around here gets it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Blood is spilled for humanity's future every day,
and these corporations are worried about PROFITS?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0006
rows.name: It's deplorable! THEY'RE deplorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0007
rows.name:
I demand cheaper prices!
Also the ability to run a tab![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0008
rows.name: Aw, what do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm aware this stuff ain't free—I just asked to put it on
a tab. They damn near laughed me out of the store![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0010
rows.name:
And just because I want Skell parts doesn't mean
they're FOR a Skell. Don't judge! You don't know me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Those parts are actually for a grand cause—
a machine which MUST be repaired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0012
rows.name:
And as soon as it's operational, I'll be rich!
Rich, I tells ya! Sweet, sweet MONEY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'll be able to pay off those parts in two days flat.
Three at the most. THEN we'll see who's laughing!
Aaaah ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0014
rows.name: ...I've said too much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0015
rows.name:
In any case, it's no mere coincidence I met a BLADE
like you on a day like today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0016
rows.name:
And hey, I'm flexible. If I can't get the high-quality
Skell parts I need to fix my little project, I'll make
do with something else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Either way, I don't suppose you'd help me track down
some materials? Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Remember, I'm going to be swimming in moolah within
days, so I'll be able to compensate you handsomely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0019
rows.name: I throw myself upon your tender mercies, good [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0020
rows.name: Sooooo, how's it going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0021
rows.name: You should be able to find both items in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll just be hanging around here while you search,
beating my head against the bureaucratic brick wall
that these arms manufacturers have built.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0023
rows.name: Hey! You're back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0024
rows.name: Did you get the goods? Tell me you got the goods![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0025
rows.name: Oh, hell yeah! This is perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0026
rows.name: My machine'll be up and running before you know it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0027
rows.name:
And with its rebirth, I shall be catapulted into wealth
beyond measure! There'll be fancy balls! Ladies in
bird masks! Diamond caviar dishes with little spoons![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Er, yeah. But that's all coming later, so I don't really
have any actual money to give you at the moment.
Next time, though. I will absolutely pay you...next time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010201_MSG0029
rows.name: Thanks again![ST:wait ]
